name: Ninja Frog
description:
Ninja Frog is a cute platformer game. It has cute graphics and simple gameplay. There are 7 different types of traps and a nice character in the game. The game levels go from easy to difficult, but all levels are easily passed.

▪ 50 Unique level
▪ 100 Achievements

Credits

Graphics: Pixel Adventure from Pixel Frog

Music: Free Music Pack Vol. 1 from Final Gate Studios
